issue.title: [R] Update developing.Rmd vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13403](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13403). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Proposed changes:
 \* Make the subheadings in "developer environment" setup match the steps in the numbered bullets
 \* "at a specific ref" -> clarify
 \* include reference table of environment variables??
 \* add flowchart to " What happens when you R CMD INSTALL?" section?
 \* "so the installation process is easy" - rephrase from "is easy" to something that acknowledges it's only easy when it goes right!
 \* "it should look _incredibly_ familiar" - rephase from "should" to "might" or similar
 \* Add something about the fact that we use tidyverse style and recommend styling code with `styler`
